resources.string: This app is not intended to be used while the vehicle is in motion.\n\nPlease drive safely!
Is there a baby on board?

BabyonBoard is not a substitute for remaining aware of children in vehicle. BabyonBoard is not a certified or guaranteed system, it is only a tool to help remind parents to check if they have a baby on board when operating a vehicle. BabyonBoard does not guarantee any outcomes, parents are still solely responsible for child safety
How would you like to connect?
